GapFillInput.Instruction: Complete each second sentence so that it means the same as the first sentence. Type the correct verb forms in the gaps. Use contractions whenever possible.

Content.Question:
1 He left the keys in the car door.
The keys were left in the car door.

2 We will take the children to the dentist.
The children will be taken to the dentist.

3 They haven't repaired our car yet.
Our car hasn't been repaired yet.

4 You must pay the lawyer as soon as possible.
The lawyer must be paid as soon as possible.

5 Pollution is destroying the river.
The river is being destroyed by pollution.

6 They didn't give us the test results until last Tuesday.
We weren't given the test results until last Thursday.

7 You should take these tablets with a glass of water.
These tablets should be taken with a glass of water.

8 The owner hadn't warned us about the loose switch.
We hadn't been warned about the loose switch.
